content:
Edit the following sentence by considering the following constraints: 
1. The sentence must be written in Latex format. 
2. The sentence must be written in passive voice. 
3. The verb "ran" must be replaced with a more specific verb that describes the physical motion of running. 
4. The sentence must include a table that lists the distance between the starting point and the station in kilometers. 
5. The sentence must include a code snippet that calculates the time it takes to run from the starting point to the station based on the distance provided in the table. 
The station was reached by the runner after a distance of \begin{table}[]
\begin{tabular}{|l|l|}
\hline
Starting Point & Station \\ \hline
10 km & 15 km \\ \hline
\end{tabular}
\end{table} kilometers had been covered. The physical motion that was employed by the runner was \textit{jogging}. The time it took to cover the distance was calculated using the following code snippet: 
\begin{verbatim}
distance = 15 - 10
speed = 8 # kilometers per hour
time = distance / speed
\end{verbatim}
The time it took to reach the station was approximately \textbf{0.625 hours}.
